column3: the healthiest entree choice I saw
column4: and a kale salad.  The salad was not worth writing about
column5: but the salmon was flavorful and flaky (make sure you get it medium rare or else it may be dry).  If you're having a cheat day or don't need to count your calories
column7: get the shrimp & grits.  My friend got it
column8: and I got to try it
